Title: The Sign of Three
Writer: Steve Thompson, Steven Moffat, Mark Gatiss, Mark Gatiss (created by), Steven Moffat (created by), Arthur Conan Doyle (based on the works of)
Actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Una Stubbs, Rupert Graves
Plot: Sherlock tries to give the perfect best man speech at John's wedding when he suddenly realizes a murder is about to take place.
